title: Rebekah Vardy's claims Peter Andre was a terrible lover - and what he said about it

Rebekah Vardy once claimed Peter Andre was the worst lover she'd ever had.

The WAG is currently locked in a bitter war of words with Coleen Rooney , who has accused her of leaking stories about her to The Sun, something Rebekah denies.

But Wayne Rooney's wife isn't the first celeb she's had a run in with.

Rebekah, who is now married to footballer Jamie Vardy and is pregnant with their third child together, once bragged about sleeping with Mysterious Girl hitmaker Peter.

She was just 21 at the time of their tryst in 2001, and was with her first husband Mark Godden at the time, although she said their marriage was coming to an end.

(Image: LightRocket via Getty Images)

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

Rebekah met the singer while she was working at a promotions company, but she later admitted in an interview that sleeping with the star wasn't everything she dreamed it would be.

And in fact, she labelled him "the worst lover I've ever had".

Speaking in 2004 about their one-night stand, Becky said: "I told him I was married. I wanted to be honest and I knew my marriage was coming to an end.

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

(Image: Instagram)

"I thought he was going to be a fantastic lover. Then he took his trousers off!

"It wasn't worth the train fare."

She added: "He didn't even attempt to satisfy me!"

She also said his penis resembled a "miniature chipolata".

(Image: Getty Images)

Not one to stand by and let anyone slag off his manhood, Peter hit back with a brilliant response.

Taking to Instagram , Peter shared a picture of a butcher holding onto a giant sausage that's even taller than the man.

"Now that's a banger," quipped Peter - followed by a cheeky smiley face.
